website_summaries.verdict: A simple but highly effective soother that uses the tried and tested “shushing” technique, popularized by acclaimed author of Happiest Baby on the Block, Dr Harvey Karp.
pros: Most babies instinctively respond to the rhythmic shushing sound
Good volume with two timer options
Compact, portable, and easy to use
Although the design is basic, most parents find the convincing sound works very well
cons: A bit pricey considering it only has a single audio option
15-30 minute timer intervals are on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!! Worked for about 10 mins.
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for about 10 mins. I guess I have to change batteries just kind a frustrating with a brand new product like this. UPDATE- I just changed the batteries on this because it’s 2 AA and if course you have to buy them because they are the most common and I don’t have them in hand...for 35$ I would think it would have better batteries...change the batteries and NOTHING. I’m SO annoyed because we ordered this for our road trip tomorrow...babies first trip and now this of course doesn’t work. Don’t waste your money! It’s tiny and doesn’t play very loud. It’s over priced and over hyped. Will NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Masterson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this at my twin's newborn photoshoot. It helped them fall right to sleep and she was able to get AMAZING shots! A few weeks later, I was going on little to no sleep trying to get my girls to calm back down and go to sleep, then a lightbulb went off and I remembered this amazing shhhh machine. So in a the wee hours of the morning, a desperate, sleep deprived mom orderer this and has been using it ever since. I usually try to only use it at bed time so they associate the sound with bed time. It really helps my girls calm down and fall asleep. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Harris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. It shushes sure, but is designed so awkwardly—you can’t lay this anywhere because it’s rounded so it is always rolling off things. The only part where you could stand this on the table is where the speaker is, so it muffles the sound. It finally rolled off the table and fell on to the wood floor, and hadn’t shushed since.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Horton

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for two months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for two months, now it has a short and intermittently stops or goes fast. Not worth all the money for something that breaks in two months.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S

customer_reviews.title: I'm a newborn photographer and this is a lifesaver for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newborn photographer and this is a lifesaver for getting babes into that deep sleep I need to pose them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works but it’s JUNK
customer_reviews.text: We got it today, opened it and.........nothing. It wouldn’t turn on. I thought maybe it didn’t come with batteries. Removed the cover and there were batteries provided. Removed the batteries and noticed the there was nothing for the battery to connect to. I took the entire thing apart, reattached the lead and finally got it to work. It’s just cheaply made and obviously not QA checked before sent. Really frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Miracle baby product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Found out about it from out newborn photographer and ordered one before we left her studio. We use it for naps, when she's fussy out and about, in the car, at night... Almost every situation we've used it. She's four months old and it's still a must have in the diaper bag. My only complaint, more of a wish maybe, is that it had a continuous mode, rather than a 30 minute shut off. I'd pay good money for one that didn't stop abruptly. I've gotten remarkably good at reseting it right before the 30 minute mark, but night time would be better if it would just keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I am a newborn photographer and use this during my sessions to sooth the baby. It works!
customer_reviews.author: ShelliQ06

customer_reviews.title: This item was amazing! I ordered it mid February for the arrival ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was amazing! I ordered it mid February for the arrival of my April baby. We used it daily since he was born in mid April, however, by mid July, it was half broken. Only one of the three settings will turn on and work. Disappointing and now I can't even exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same Product as Before
customer_reviews.text: I’m saddened to write a review like this for this product, but it’s not the same product I fell in love with. They must have changed manufacturers and cheaped their production costs. I purchased a second shusher after my first (one I purchased three years ago) stopped working. The new one was lighter; cheaper feeling; and significantly lower in noise. It’s just so subpar to the product they used to produce. I’m returned the newer one and will try to find an alternative. They took a good product and totally ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Trojanchick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: All babies are different. Dosnt work all the time with mine,but I’m happy I purchased. I like taking it on our car ride to pick up big brother from school.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: did he just shush me???!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not get this item. We bought it thinking it was going to help but naw, tried it a few times, no difference. Just another piece of plastic marked up in price to make a profit off of. Seriously sounds like a dude shushing. I can do that myself thank you very much. I hope my 2 month old baby will remember that I bought the shusher for her.... I’m sure she’ll thank me someday...
customer_reviews.author: andi wallisch

customer_reviews.title: Great!--When it works.....
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased arrived broken, and Amazon quickly shipped me a replacement one. The second one I received only worked every so often, and typically needed to be jiggled around to get it to work. I was not impressed at the cheap-quality feeling of this almost $40 portable white noise machine. I was expecting something much better. However, when the Shusher DID work, it worked amazingly well with my baby! Unfortunately, it wasn't well enough to put up with all the problems. I ended up returning it and buying the $10 SkipHop portable Owl White Noise machine, and I like it much better.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I opened this (sealed) box and noticed that the Shusher appeared dirty. When I was inspecting it, I turned the bottom and it turned on, which I thought was weird because it supposedly needs batteries installed. I opened the back of the Shusher to insert batteries to see that someone had already installed batteries and there was some sort of ointment or white/clear substance all over the back of it!!! This thing was clearly returned and amazon re-sent it out without any quality control. How disgusting, especially for a baby product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Stick with the app! This company also offers a $5 app and that was worth the money. We used it for our son when he was a newborn, and it helped get him to sleep. We wanted our phones back, so we tried this, but the volume is wonky, the shape of the product doesn’t make sense and it shuts off too soon, and our son would wake up when the machine shut off. He doesn’t use the Shusher app anymore but at least it would stay on for 1 hour+. Save your money and buy the app instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear, low volume
customer_reviews.text: The reason I'm rating this product so low is the volume control. This device is supposed to have volume control but it doesn't go loud at all even when it's all the way turned up. And when it's on the lower volume you can't even hear it. Shushing is by far the best noise to help a baby sleep but it needs to be able to go louder when you have a crying baby that any one who has been around kids would know babies are LOUD. Will be returning product and trying something else out. We use our phones for Shushing just wanted a device so we didn't have to leave our phone while baby naps
customer_reviews.author: Jacqie

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it does
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t help. Didn’t sooth our baby. It’s not loud nor does it shush long. I think I got a faulty one. It does stand unless you make it facing down, in which will cover the speaker. The noise is a human “sshhhh”. I’m glad it worked for others but too bad I didn’t work for our baby. I also paid for the app before I got this product. The app sounds different than this but it’s louder. Too expensive for either the physical product or the app.
customer_reviews.author: Celery

customer_reviews.title: GREAT - a must buy - needs improvements!
customer_reviews.text: I rolled my eyes at the thought of buying a machine for something a mother should do, buy my twin girls loved that sound and it was the only sound to get them to sleep and stay asleep so I bought this! It’s great and helped them sleep FOR SURE! No sound machine I have seen has this as an option. BUTTTT .... you can’t sit this on the ground due to design, this has a timer that lasts about 15 min then turns off which SUCKS as it would wake up my babies after getting them to sleep after forever. Batteries last a long time and have not had to replace in 18wks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm...but not durable
customer_reviews.text: We place it and our babies crib at night and soothes him to sleep, freeing us to get other things done while we monitor the baby. We also use in his swing. Very easy to use, clean, and very effective. I have seen other reviews stating there are apps you can use. However, you’re not gonna leave your cell phone with your baby. This, you can. Edit: I’ve downgraded my rating because they’re simply not durable. One drop and the battery cover latch break. I’ve already gone through 2 baby shushers. Both had minor drops and broke in the exact same place.
customer_reviews.author: voidandshadow

customer_reviews.title: Puts my baby in a deep sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I laughed the first time I saw this. But the first time I used this on my son he stopped crying and I was able to get him into the car without screaming the whole ride. I even took it in the store with me and just payed it next to him inside his car seat. It is very light and has a few different options on volume control and how fast the shushing goes. It shuts off after awhile which is good for battery life. Sometimes I use it when he’s sleeping and I feel like it puts him in a deeper sleep so I can get things done at round the house. It was a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Works great with consistent use. We use it only for sleeptime so either naps or bedtime. Helps get our daughter into a deeper sleep once we lay her down. I agree with other reviewers about how I wish there was a more gradual shut off before finally shutting off. I just do it myself but lowering little by little if she falls sleep right way. I also agree with the design. It rolls really earlier so it falls off my nightstand unless you have it next to something to stop it. Color make it easy to find in the dark but would be nice if it glowed somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for car rides
customer_reviews.text: This shusher has been really helpful for my baby who hates riding in the car. It seems like a pretty simple product but it has made a world of difference. This has been the only way we have been able to travel with our newborn without her screaming the entire ride. My newborn inevitably starts crying when being put in the car; we turn on the shusher at the start of the ride and after about 10 minutes she is fast asleep and I am able to drive without cringing from having to listen to a screaming baby in the backseat and being unable to calm her.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine S

customer_reviews.title: There are better options for a lower price
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused why this product is so highly recommended. 1. This is NOT a white noise machine. 2. The shhh sound can only be played in 15 or 30 min increments. 3. The only perk of this device is that it is portable and small. BUT, the volume level is so low that if we were to try to use this in public there’s no way Baby would be able to hear the shh sound over the outside noise. I am returning and sticking to the “baby shushing sound” I found on Apple Music that I can just play on repeat all night over our speaker in our bedroom instead.
customer_reviews.author: maribel s.

customer_reviews.title: Shhhhitty design
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the design is shhhhitty... I have only good things to say about the sound and quality. My problem is with its awkward shape/physical geometry. 1.) It's difficult to turn on/adjust the sound one-handed (when holding a baby). 2.) The speaker is located on the bottom so it's not very audible when you orientate and place it on what you'd think to be its base. 3.) The top of the thing is spherical shaped so setting it upsidedown is also not an option 4.) The side is round so it rolls all over the place
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: One size does not fit everyone
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for us. This device only has one sound, unlike many other soothing machines. I am sure this sound works for some babies, but ours would get wide eyes every time I tried to turn this on. It had the opposite to soothing effect on my baby. And, to me this sounds more off-putting and disturbing, and alarming, then soothing. I guess everyone is different when it comes to sounds. Mine is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: More for mom's sanity than baby
customer_reviews.text: I kind of feel like this is more for moms sanity than for baby. I honestly was up one night with my crying colicky baby in those first few weeks home... the ones that all blur together. I must of been in my sleep deprived state searching for any remedy on amazon. This shusher arrived 2 days later. It did help a bit, but if the baby was super upset it just added more noise. I found it useful in the car or in carseat just to put very low. The baby seemed to think i was there with him. Ultimately it probably depends on baby if this will work. For us, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jaana Shingledecker

customer_reviews.title: I hesitate to write this review
customer_reviews.text: The Babyshusher is one of the best infant inventions in quite some time. Works awesome and somehow the constant sound calms my 2 month down enough to sleep. Love this product. However, when I received my Babyshusher and opened it to check the batteries and check it out, I was disappointed. It was filled with a Vaseline-type substance inside. There was also a brownish, sticky glob. (Considering that this is a baby tool, you can draw your own conclusions.) It works and it does the trick, but I am NOT happy about getting something clearly returned or at the very least, mishandled.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Coronato

customer_reviews.title: Get the app. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered TWO of these, one for upstairs and one for downstairs. One didn’t work right out of the package and as a new mom I didn’t have time to try to return it especially bc I already threw out the packaging so there goes that money out the window. Well here we are now, my baby is 3 months and the second one stopped working. So annoying. Just buy the app. It’s better anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny J Anvari

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Baby Shower Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I took this to the hospital when I went into labor. During the discharge class my baby went to the nursery with this and they said it put all the babies right to sleep. The nurses were gushing over it. We began using it immediately with our little one and it really helped when we got home on those rough nights because it gave him comfort when we were utterly exhausted. I have since gifted this to friends who are expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Duke

customer_reviews.title: Best baby shower gift we received that we never knew about!
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift even though it wasn't on our baby registry and it has been a sleep saver! We used this the first couple months to help our son take longer naps and sometimes even at the end of the bedtime routine. After reading that it's better to have a consistent white noise for overnight sleep, we stopped using at night time and went with his wave noise machine. But this still helps when he's not wanting to nap. Because of how great it worked for us, we bought this one for our friends who are due next month.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Shusher works great but product is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Just went through our 2nd shusher in 2 months. The first one after time the sound of the shushing changed and almost sounded spastic and super quick. I thought the batteries were dying so I open the lid and there is this weird gel/stick substance everywhere with a weird screw that seems randomly placed in the gel. Ordered a new one and the same thing happened within 3 weeks. For the price, this is not acceptable. I might try the app; as I refused to spend another $35 on this product (already spent $70). Also annoying how loud the clicks are to turn it off and back on if it times out.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Best for on the go, great gift for expecting moms
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our on the go, diaper bag Must haves. We use it in the car, out in public, visiting friends or family, and send it with him to the sitter. Even if we’re out in a public space, I can adjust the noise level to the surrounding environment to where it blends in but is enough to keep him in a calm soothed state. I definitely recommend at first following the instruction of using it when all needs are met. Baby is fed, diapered, and comfortable first. It seemed to help set it up as a positive association rather than a bandaid for fussiness.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Felt this was essential, but didn't last long for me
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much as a gift that I bought one for a friend. Would not go anywhere without this, as it has a nice portable size and really helps put baby to sleep and keep baby sleeping. All was well until months later--think about 8-9 months? my shusher stopped working. I tried to change the battery and that didn't help. Emailed support and my thing is out of warranty. I ended up disassembling it and at least recycling the plastic :-/
customer_reviews.author: Alee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 month old twin grand babies. The day I received the babyshusher I was keeping them and they were both having a meltdown. I turned it on and proceeded to the room where one was crying and within the first two minutes he had calmed down and was falling asleep. I then brought it in the room where the other one was and I was amazed at what I witnessed. To think that something that went shush would be worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Carcich

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us. Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how this has so many stars and reviews. As someone who uses white noise for my babies all the time at home I needed something like that on the go. This thing is soooo quiet and the shushing that comes and goes and slow and pretty annoying. My baby girl didn’t even realize I was holding this up to her ear while she was crying, which defends the whole purpose of why I bought it. I’m returning it
customer_reviews.author: Evelina

customer_reviews.title: not all the time works wonderful. Remember everyone every Baby is different
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it takes a little longer for the Baby to shhhhh and fall sleep 💤 my only complaint is the price: expensive. But it works... slowly..., but finally he sleeps, one more observation: not all the time works wonderful. Remember everyone every Baby is different. Thanks New-Up date 2/28/2018 "Baby Shusher sleep miracle soother"... is working much much better, what I mean is, that the Baby is responding to the sound when he gets fuzzy around his nap time. He is very young, just 4 months old. I can say that this invention is pretty good Mom's, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.N/P🐾

customer_reviews.title: my husband couldn't believe I'd even thought to buy something like this, but guess what
customer_reviews.text: I found this item one night with no sleep when I realized the only way we oculd get our baby (under 6 mo) to sleep, was to "shh, shhh" and rock her. I thought, there has to be an item that does this for me so that I don't have to do it ALL the time. Lazy, I know. I found this, my husband couldn't believe I'd even thought to buy something like this, but guess what. IT WORKS!!! We've always put her to sleep, shushing her--so of course it works. I'd have to admit, it was probably a ridiculous buy, but I don't regret it at 3 am when it puts her back to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: We loved this thing. Best idea ever. Baby loved it and it was so effective. My only complaint is if you drop it, even from a foot high onto carpet, it can mess it up and it either stops working completely or gets stuck in the shush-mode (and not in a good way). Its shape makes it prone to rolling and easy to fall off things. We went through two before giving up on buying more since they arent exactly cheap. We loved it when it worked but should be more durable. Our first one lasted 4 months and the second only 2 months. For the price, I would expect a little more.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hetchler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality on most recent version received
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my first kid 3 years ago & it was amazing, even gave some as gifts to friends. But this one we just got is awful! It isn’t loud at all even on highest & sometimes it makes weird noises when we try to turn it on (like radio frequencies). Maybe we got a bad one, but it’s a hassle to exchange & just get another poor quality one. Contact me please if there’s anything you can do. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Clear

customer_reviews.title: The product title says it all
customer_reviews.text: After reading the "baby bible", a book that covers everything on newborns, I found this little gem. It helps you get your baby to that relaxed state where they can fall asleep and stay asleep. It has the same sounds you make for shushing but you don't have to do any of the work. Honestly one of the greatest products we have bought. This will be my gift for any of our friends that have kids.
customer_reviews.author: J's Review

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Don't wait
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking at this thing forever my 3rd baby is 11 months and I finally pulled the trigger she loves this shish. It's 1:30 in the morning and I am so happy I have this thing totally worth it she diswunt back down no issues and I don't have to sit there inI've been looking at this thing forever my 3rd baby is 11 months and I finally pulled the trigger she loves this shush. It's 1:30 in the morning and I am so happy I have this thing totally worth it she just went back down no issues and I don't have to sit there in there and shush her
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Koval

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep baby asleep but won’t put baby to sleep
customer_reviews.text: My baby just cried off and on for 30 minutes over the sound of the baby shusher at full volume. He did not want to sleep with therefore he didn’t. He also had his pacifier in his mouth and was being rocked in his rock n play. What stopped his crying for the most part? Being held by mommy. And yes prior to using the shusher he had been fed and changed. The shusher does help a baby wavering in and out of sleep get to sleep fast and stay that way for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help baby, but great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: What I wrote when my child was an infant: “This works as described but doesn’t seem to calm my baby.” I gave it 3 stars. Now, with a 1-year-old: this is awesome. It really helps her go to sleep and drowns out “startling” noises (like me doing the dishes after she’s in bed). I like that it doesn’t go all night (not sure how much white noise affects hearing, but I do like that she’s able to sleep in total quiet, even though I use this shusher when I first put her down. I’d give it 5 stars for a toddler. I still wish it had worked better when my child was an infant though, so: 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lenergyrlah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on my newborn
customer_reviews.text: My baby newborn photographer recommended this to me as she uses it on her client to keep them calm and sleep throughout the photo session. I immediately purchased it as my newborn has trouble sleeping calmly through the night. Unfortunately, it doesn’t work for her. We would have it on all night and yet baby stays up for hours and when she finally sleeps, she tosses and turns a lot. I guess, it’s a great product but it doesn’t work on every baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Totally works
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this thing. I was skeptical at first due to the price, but it is totally worth it. The only thing that is super annoying is that it shuts off at 30 mins. Wish there was an option for continuous loop. My baby sleeps for 45 mins or longer if the shusher is still on. So I have to run over and start the timer over so he doesn’t wake up. I love the sound though. It seems odd, but babies love it since it reminds them of being inside mom.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilflower

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works which is only a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing product when it works which is for about one month only. We had this problem with our last child that the Shusher would last a month to two at most before being completely unusable. I hoped they fixed the glitch but no such luck. The shushing starts normal and then speeds up to an obnoxious pace then turns off. This happens no matter which setting you use. I wish I could return for a replacement because it really is a great product when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Penn

customer_reviews.title: Helpful when it works
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but as a new parent I rely on them so here it goes. The shusher has been an amazing help at calming our fussy newborn... when it works. Our little girl is 3 months old and this thing has been working spotty at best for the last month or so. We have to smack it, shake it, twist it 100x before it’ll work most of the time. Even as I’m writing this I’m listening to it malfunction (which is this super high pitch obnoxious sound). I ended up just downloading the app which has the same sound and less issues. Such a shame as this is really helpful when it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Penm

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: The best baby item you'll ever buy! The shusher is the one product my husband and I both swear by. We gift this to everyone we know who is having a baby. Our son loves it. It's quick, light and portable. The shusher keeps bedtimes and nap-times consistent no matter where our child is sleeping. Also, its indestructible. My kid has thrown it many times and it survives. It was even tossed into a toilet once and when we pulled it out it was still shushing. We took the shusher apart, cleaned it, dried it and have never had a problem despite it being waterlogged.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Michelle

customer_reviews.title: How will any of us ever sleep again?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LIFE! We all need it to sleep now. My ONLY wish is that there was an option for it to not shut off. Currently it has an off, 15 minute, and 30 minute option. Sometimes our daughter does fine once it kicks off but sometimes we have to hurry to get it back on again. It would just be cool if there were one more option for infinity mode where it would remain on until you turn it off OR better yet, if it would kick back on once noise was detected.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Read true review before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well I have mixed feelings about this product. First of all the volume. At least with my grandson he likes a louder white noise. He shuts up immediately when we use YouTube & white noise. When we put this with him it takes a minute to quiet him. I also think they have to be a little older. The age where they are learning to self soothe also. I will say it’s convenient for travel. Would be better though if it came with a rechargeable battery & a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carter

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I run a white noise machine all night long, but it is hard for my son (4 months) to go back to sleep after his 4am bottle so I add this. It only runs for 15 mins or 30 mins and I actually like that because it gets annoying (for myself) after a while LOL. But once I lay him back down, I turn this on (in addition to the white noise) and it distracts/soothes him enough to not fuss before falling back asleep! It isn't a miracle worker, but I'm glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use one-handed and not an offensive sounding shush
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use one-handed and not an offensive sounding shush. The volume control is the same end as the speaker, which makes adjusting the volume easy when the shusher is hanging. Our baby calms with shushing, so this works for us. We were using a sound app before for white noise, which was okay too. This is just quick and easy to throw in the car or a diaper bag to have handy at a moment's notice.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a few months - just put the app on an old phone
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about three months but now it plays really really fast like a weird EDM track shshshshshshsh. I was buying it for friends who were expecting and now I regret it. Just get an old phone, connect to WiFi and download the app.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: You have no clue what you’re missing right now!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a heaven sent!! We used it for our son from birth until he passed away at 19 months. It has no age limit due to the soothing white noise and the fact it was incorporated into bedtime routine so it’s a cue for his little body to go to bed. It’s easy to take on the go—road trips, doctor appointments etc. it has a timer so you don’t have to worry about hearing the shh over the monitor all night and you can control the volume. Plus it even survived many many drops and falls. The batteries last quite a while as well
customer_reviews.author: Murphy Lammon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Genius invention! REALLY helps putting a baby to sleep. My newborn will nap only while the thing is on. Would be helpful if there was an hour setting, or just on an off button without a timer.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the shusher with one exception. Ours started messing up so now it’s a “remix” shusher and instead of calming, long shushes, it’s quick shushes then very quick shushes which ultimately makes it turn off faster...not to mention catch the baby off guard. Since it’s a pretty pricey machine for only getting shushes, we haven’t bought another one and opted for another one that had a similar sound option but cheaper. The “remix” started after having the shusher approximately 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Davis

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this item while babysitting a friend's child. During the time we had our newborn I wanted to purchase this item. You can always purchase the phone app. Although, the app is not free, why not just buy the device and not have to use your phone every time to simply play the app. You will be stuck with having to leave your phone in whichever room the baby is sleeping, and it'll use your phone's battery. Oh and more importantly, when using the phone app someone may call your phone pausing the app and disturb the baby from their sleep. Go ahead and purchase this item and not the phone app. It'll payoff in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: WhoDatDB9

customer_reviews.title: Great for naps
customer_reviews.text: The photographer that took my newborns pictures was using this in her studio to sooth. My son slept so good while she took pictures. I bought it right away. I’ve had it now for over 10weeks. I take it on car rides. Use it to get my son to nap. I use it everyday. I like that it automatically turns off after a while. At night I use a white noise machine still but this little gadget is still one of my favorite buys.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M Green

customer_reviews.title: Love this, but room for design improvement
customer_reviews.text: Some people complained about the fact that this will only stay on 15 or 30 minutes, but I actually like that it turns off because I don’t want my son to need it all night to sleep. My only complaint is the shape which is almost impossible to turn on/off with one hand. I used the phone app a lot and wanted to not have to leave my phone in the baby’s room. This thing has been great for us and my son is soothed by the shushing noise.
customer_reviews.author: ERO_foto

customer_reviews.title: trust me - you need this !!
customer_reviews.text: number one thing i would recommend for new parents !! this came up as something to register for and i didn’t think it was necessary - until the newborn photographer used it during my twin girls photo shoot and i saw how well it soothed them ! so portable and love the 15 minute or 30 minute timer option . i can put it wherever they are on the couch , in the swing , or wherever and it helps soothe them and create white noise . definitely a must have item !
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker
customer_reviews.text: We got this when my baby was about 2 weeks old to help soothe. THIS THING IS AMAZING. It’s almost hypnotic for her. The minute it comes on she starts to calm down and it always puts her to sleep. I love that it automatically shuts off after 15 min or so because I can leave it on near her crib and not have to go turn it off. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie.

customer_reviews.title: Eh. A good product but wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we did a newborn photo shoot and she used it. My daughter was sleeping the entire time, super peaceful. I ordered one the next day on amazon- and it work OK but the sound turns off too quickly, so we are constantly having to restart it to get my daughter asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Danzer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great while it lasted. We use it at night to add that extra layer of white noise to help the baby fall asleep. It always helped our baby fall asleep. However we originally got one as a gift from our amazon registry and that one broke after about 3 months (was not working even with battery change) but we were able to exchange it. We have had this one for about 4 months and again it is broken, not working even with a battery change. So I would say save your money because the cost is not worth the few months of use that you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work to soothe my kiddo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was at my wits end and desperate to soothe my baby. She cries when I bathe her, change her diaper, dress her, etc. it worked the first time I used it because I think she was mesmerized by it but after that it no longer phased her or soothes her. I know if works for a lot of other parents so maybe it’s just my babe
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off after 30 minutes requires two hands to turn on not that easy on the go
customer_reviews.text: The sound of the “shhhhh” is definitely the best of all the other noise machines... major downfall is it shuts off at 30 minutes.. WHY?? This is proven to disrupt babies sleep... it’s designed to be on the go, but you have to use 2 hands to turn on.. not ideal for use in the car longer than 30 minutes... After changing the batteries The top falls off unless it’s switched on
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great for bed time!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. When I put my little guy down for the night, he usually wakes up about an hour later and I usually have to rock him back to sleep or nurse him. But now I just put my hand on him and turn on the shusher and within a few minutes he is back to sleep! This thing rocks! Getting him to sleep for the night has been so much easier. Also when he is fussing during the day I put this on as loud as it goes and he stops immediately. It's kind of funny actually!
customer_reviews.author: kansascity

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, one suggestion:
customer_reviews.text: EDIT- product broke and now does a fast shshshsh instead of a soothing noise. Will attempt to get a replacement. AWESOME product!! The ONLY thing I would change about this is to add the option to just leave it on. The timers are great features, but having twins, sometimes I wish I could just let it run without worrying that it'll turn off too soon to calm the second twin. (Simultaneous diaper blowouts that require some cleaning sometimes cause quite a bit of upset.) However, I did order a second one to keep one upstairs and one downstairs. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin DG Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be great with a few minor tweaks
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews but we got this for our 8 day old daughter and so far everything has been working great. I do have two items for feedback. 1) I wished there was more timer options. It only has a 15 and 30 min option but a 1, 2, or indefinite options would make this 5 stars. 2) It would be nice to have a flat spot on the top so that the top can be stood up so that the speaker fires up. Today the speaker side is flat and to stand it up the speaker would be face down and gets very muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I've had this guy since August and it worked well for 2 months. Now when it's on longer than 5 mins, the shusher doesn't shush properly. It's like something broke and it does quick 1 second shush's instead of the long 5-6 second shushes. It's pretty useless now. I use my phone for shushing. Also, the only way to sit this down without it rolling around is on the speaker, which doesn't make much sense. I can't turn this own sit it on the couch without it rolling off. Maybe rethink the design to where you can put the shusher down while it's shushing. Send me a replacement, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Shape and 30 min cap = bad
customer_reviews.text: The shape is really idiotic. It rolls everywhere. The app on my phone is much better for many reasons: Volume on my phone is louder and I can set the timer to be longer than 30 minutes. To have a noose machine shut off after 15-30 minutes is quite jarring for a newborn, so I’m not sure what they were thinking
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: great- but wish it didn't automatically shut off
customer_reviews.text: this babyshusher is a miracle when it comes to calming baby. It allows parents to stop the active "shushing" until they are purple in the face. the portable size makes it conveinant for everyday use as well as travel. the only drawback is that it automatically shuts off after a certain time which is a nightmare when you have to sneakily turn it back on without waking baby. i would suggest a portable white noise machine over the baby shusher solely based on the automatic shut off feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider!
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed with this. I’ve used it for a month and the sound has already went haywire. The shush isn’t a shush anymore. For paying over $30 I expected more then a broken item.
customer_reviews.author: EPnMomma

customer_reviews.title: Keep trying don't give up
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the shusher it didn't work for my baby but now my baby is almost 4 months old and the shusher is the one thing we can't do without for nap time/ bed time. My little guy has a cold right now but still the shusher plus nursing and rocking do the trick everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Nmartinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product but big defect in battery clip
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Puts my baby to sleep. But there is a big design flaw. The clip that holds the battery easily breaks if dropped which once your baby is mobile will happen. Tape doesn’t hold it long. And will sputter the sound if it works at all. If seller reads this please contact me as would like to get another clip. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: radio reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't super effective
customer_reviews.text: It never put my baby to sleep but it distracted him. I wouldn't say it calmed him down because the crying will always come back. I also wasn't sure how to navigate the volume so I just twisted around until something came about. I'm rating this right in the middle because I believe this is very subjective to your child as well. it didn't work for mine - it might work for yours.
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca

customer_reviews.title: We are absolutely in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: We are absolutely in love with this product!! Among all of the baby stuff out there we tried to keep it minimal. Even though this is more of a "want" then a "need" I decided to try it. Worst case scenario I return it right? This thing is terrific!! As a first time mom I am a firm believer in buying anything that will allow you to get more sleep. We put it in her bassinet to help soothe her for bedtime or when she wakes at 3am. We put it in her swing, car seat, attach it to her carrier, and I even hold it in my hand while rocking her. We take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Use the app.
customer_reviews.text: This has potential but the fact that it only plays for 30 minutes is tough. It also stopped working correctly after just a month, the shushing now overlaps and sounds insane, it doesn't seem to affect babe but drives me nuts and I would assume won't work as well in the long run since there is no more nice rhythm to the shushing.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Short product lifespan
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonderfully for the first two months and that’s why I’m giving it 2 stars. The sound function was good and it was easy to use. It helped my newborn calm down and fall asleep nightly. However it has since started to malfunction (not bad batteries and it has never been dropped). I expected this product to last longer being that it cost $30+ Sadly I recommend this product to close family and have since had to tell them about mine no longer working. Overall I’m disappointed that this did not have a longer lifespan and I can’t return it because it’s been longer than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Britan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but not long enough
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My twin boys pass out with this on and I would love to give 5 stars but the biggest drawback is that it only goes on long enough for a 30 minute time span. I have to constantly get up to turn it back on. My boys will wake up the minute it’s off. Because of that reason, i now have to look for another sound machine for them.
customer_reviews.author: J.Grenier

customer_reviews.title: Great... while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this baby shusher... while it worked. We bought it in February, & here we are in June and it just quit working. We have tried changing the batteries, and have done everything we can, with no luck. If it still worked, I would have given it 10 stars. It soothed my baby within seconds and put him right to sleep and kept him in a deep sleep longer.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Adams

customer_reviews.title: Our first impression of the Baby Shusher came while at ...
customer_reviews.text: Our first impression of the Baby Shusher came while at our photographer's studio. Our children became fussy and she turned on the baby shusher and instantaneously both of our girls (2.5 years old and 6 months old) stopped fussing/crying and were entranced with the sound. At that point we knew we needed to get one. Since purchasing we have found that it worked well at first with helping calm our 6 month old and help her fall asleep however she seems to have gotten used to the noise now and it doesn't have the same effect that it once did.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Settles

customer_reviews.title: This saved us!!
customer_reviews.text: For such an easy concept it works amazing. Seriously one of the only things that would calm our daughter down. We have purchased 2 of them and the app on our phones as well just so we always have it in hand. Like that there is a volume control and the timers. Highly recommend to new parents!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Came defective
customer_reviews.text: This came defective. The battery area was covered in a vaseline- like substance and had rust near the batteries. It is hard to see, but there was A LOT. UPDATE: I changed the rating to a 4, because the seller reached out to me and they are absolutely amazing. It seems my product accidentally got through final inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my daughter was a few weeks old and we've been using it daily since! When she was a newborn we used everywhere but now that she's nearing toddlerhood we mainly use it for naps and bedtime. She knows when the shusher turns on it's time to sleep! At nearly a year old, ours broke. The batter clip snapped. I contacted the company directly and they're sending me a new clip.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: high hopes, but fails
customer_reviews.text: I gave this thing a good week of everyday use to try and quiet our little fussy gus. This does nothing for her. If anything, it gets her to scream louder. Also, it doesn't really sound like SSSHHHHHH. It sounds more like static you'd hear from a radio. You are better off playing Rock a Bye Baby from phone playlist or The Wheels on a Bus. That at least calms her.
customer_reviews.author: DPearl

customer_reviews.title: Magical Invention
customer_reviews.text: Whoever invented this thing is a freaking genius! I was to shake their hand, give them a high five, and sing a high praise. I wish i had known about this for our first child. I can't tell you the amount of times we just walked around our house going "SHHHHHUUUUUSSSSSHHHHHH" just to get the baby to either stop crying or sleep. With this device we just crank it up and our newest addition is out like a light in 0-60. This has come in handy when we are on car trips, in a restaurant, at home, pretty much anywhere. Highly recommend to any parent(s) with infants.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Cobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Works, but sadly not for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: We tried using this on our daughter because our photographer had one she used on her, but she didn’t like it when we tried it on her. I has a really long shush sound. I wish they had a few different lengths on the shusher noise because she likes shorter shushes when being consoled. I will say it almost put me and my mother-in-law to sleep. Lol
customer_reviews.author: HoustonisHome

customer_reviews.title: Worst, most stupid baby purchase I made.
customer_reviews.text: $35 for this is insane. Especially when the same company has an app for $5 that’s ones the same thing. I purchased their app, then realized there are even better apps with more sounds. Maybe $15 tops for this physical version but I’m quite sure there are better, portable, sound machines.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this my husband said it was a waste of money and stupid.... well, we use it every single night and it helps our little one sleep. He accidentally dropped it, and when he went to pick it up, he kicked it across the floor and it broke!!! He was so quick to order another one it was hilarious! Well worth the money, they love this shussing noise, it calms them and helps them relax. I heard it was bc when they are in our belly, this is the noise our blood makes running thru our veins and it reminds them of that! So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Literally all babies are soothes by this. You can control the volume and how long it plays for. The batteries last for a long time. I use this in my work for newborn photography and I cannot tell you how many parents have purchased it from amazon during the session. It’s a must have for new parents!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Good sleep aid for newborns
customer_reviews.text: It's a sleep aid not a miracle worker. It keeps my baby somewhat calm. But that's all it does. The parent has to put in the work before the shusher is effective, which is common sense. Like, you need to see what is wrong with your child and then use this. And it'll work. It works with my 2 week old.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! As long as baby is comfortable (ie fed, burped, and clean diaper), the sound helps calm my 6 month old to sleep in his swing. I also downloaded the app version on my tablet so I could keep the shushing sound on longer than 30 minutes. Plus, it's only $5 for the app. It's best to use a bluetooth speaker with the app though because it doesn't sound as loud through the tablet speakers. I wish I had purchased this sooner because I struggled to get him to sleep anywhere other than in my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday! For pretty much every nap! My babies have never slept this great! I can do things while they sleep and they don’t get startled anymore! The only thing I would change is having a longer run time/timer! The batteries that it came with are still going strong! And it’s been three months of using it a ton. Absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite baby items as first time parents. So much easier than shushing yourself (that gets surprisingly tiring very very quickly). Our baby loves it and it helps put her to sleep. The only downside is it almost puts me to sleep too while I’m trying to rock baby to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: We've bought three!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works miracles! We're on our third shusher - we buy them to take to daycare and on the go. They work miracles on getting our little ones to calm down and fall asleep. I've recommended these to a few friends and family members. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H

customer_reviews.title: New Parent MUST HSVE!
customer_reviews.text: Best New Baby Product On the market!! My daughter recieved as a gift for her 3rd baby & wishes she'd had for All three!! Plus Every new mom I gift this to Raves About HOW GREAT it is! Everyone commitments that one Great thing is it's So Easy & Useful it Goes Everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth R-Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not Necessary
customer_reviews.text: I think this was pretty pointless, especially for the price. It only goes for up 30 minutes, so I found myself having to restart it a lot, because it helps my baby stay asleep. Pro tip: just find a “Shh” song on Spotify and play it on repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing for babies with Colic!
customer_reviews.text: My son suffered from colic for months! This was one of the only things that would calm him. He is now four and we turn it on, on the nights he has trouble sleeping. We just got another one for my friend that had a baby shower and I know she is going to love it! Totally recommend this to new parents and old!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Every mother NEEDS this!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best thing you could get for a new baby! It helps soothe and calm them. When my son was first born we used it to help him sleep and to calm him whilst crying. SO HELPFUL! We took it with us everywhere! The battery lasted probably 3 months with pretty much constant usage. The price is a little steep but for real so worth it! You won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TrustinJesus

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purely on reviews. There is not very many products out there with 2k reviews and so close to having perfect reviews. I didn't even know I would need something like this. Must have for colicky babies. I got it when she was 5 weeks when she wasn't even fussy. Colic came exactly at 6 weeks exactly and I'm so glad I have something that makes her happier and a better sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Robin
